summary: TL_Spell : Some custom spells and modifications
descriptionHtml:
TL_Spell

version 8

author : Tango Luni


TL_Spell : Some new spells and modifications


Wrye Bash(Wrye Smash)Installer, Bain ready archive.

01_TL_Spell_Base

TL_Spell.esm
Main plugin. All new spells in this plugin.

TL_Spell_NPC.esp
Dragon Priests and some encounter warlocks named \"Lunatic\" use TL_Spell Destruction.

TL_Spell_Leveled_Item.esp
New spell tomes are added to vendors and loots.
New master rank tomes is not found by default.

TL_Spell_Leveled_Item_Master_in_Expert_Rank.esp
New spell tomes are added to vendors and loots.
New master rank tomes is in expert rank.

Leveled_Item conflicts. Use either one.


10_TL_Spell_Options

TL_MGEF_PerkImpactStagger_Resist.esp
Impact Stagger, Intense Flames, Deep Freeze with resist Fire/Frost/Shock.
See also TL_MGEF_PerkImpactStagger_Resist.txt

TL_MGEF_No_FrostSlow.esp
Frost Spell Slow is disabled(change to Script).
See also TL_MGEF_No_FrostSlow.txt

TL_MGEF_Enchant_FortifySpellPowerMod_NoSchool.esp
Fortify Spell Enchantment fortify spells, not lower cost.
Enchantment Magic Effect School is changed to NONE.
See also TL_MGEF_Enchant_FortifySpellPowerMod_NoSchool.txt

TL_PerkSkillBoosts_Mod_Spell_Magnitude_Duration.esp
With this plugin, spell power will scale with your skill.
See also TL_PerkSkillBoosts_Mod_Spell_Magnitude_Duration.txt



Requirements

Skyrim version 1.6.89.0


How to get spells :

Craft spellbook at Tanning Rack
or
Get from vendor, loots with this plugin(use either one)
TL_Spell_Leveled_Item.esp
TL_Spell_Leveled_Item_Master_in_Expert_Rank.esp


TL_Spell Alteration List
*version 8

A0 Barkskin		Damage Resist, Fortify Health.
A1 Barkskin Area	15-foot radius Damage Resist, Fortify Health.
A1 Stoneskin
A2 Stoneskin Area
A2 Ironskin
A3 Ironskin Area
A3 Daedraskin
A4 Daedraskin Area
A4 Dragonskin
A5 Dragonskin Area

*A2 Ghost Armor Area	15-foot radius Damage Resist, Fortify Health, Water Breathing, Water Walking, Resist Falling Damage.
*A3 Spirit Armor Area
*A4 Phantom Armor Area
*A5 Ether Armor Area	15-foot radius Damage Resist, Fortify Health, Water Breathing, Water Walking, Resist Stagger, Resist Falling Damage.

*Mage Armor Perk, Waterwalking fix
Waterwalking is active while you are not moving.

A0 Dangerous Jump	Push Self +30.
A1 Dangerous Dash	Fast Movement. Warning:Falling damage.
A1 Throw Self		Push Self +30. Resist Falling Damage.
A2 Throw Self x2	Push Self +60. Resist Falling Damage.
A3 Throw Self x5	Push Self +150. Resist Falling Damage.
A2 Whirlwind Walk	Fast Movement <mag>, Resist Falling Damage.

A0 Dispel Self		Dispel Self.
A1 Dispel Target	100-foot range Dispel Target Actor.
A2 Dispel Target Area	15-foot radius Dispel Target.
A3 Dispel Wave		120-foot long, 30 degree Cone Dispel.
A4 Dispel Self Area	100-foot radius Dispel Self.

A4 Etherealize		Etherealize Self.
A4 Ethereal Jump	Push Self +150. Etherealize Self.
A4 Ethereal Dash	Fast Movement. Warning:Falling damage. Etherealize Self.
A5 Etherealize Area	15-foot radius Etherealize.

A3 Haste Self		Haste self. Buggy.
A5 Almost Time Stop	Almost Time Stop. Buggy.

A0 Detect Creature	200-foot radius Detect creature.
A0 Mark Creature	200-foot radius Mark creature.
A1 Lost Detect Creature	Detect Creature. Works as Cloak spells.
A2 Lost Detect Dead	Detect Dead/Living. Works as Cloak spells.
A3 Lost Detect Enemy	Detect Friend/Enemy. Works as Cloak spells.
A4 Lost Detect Undead	Detect Friend/Enemy/Dead/Living. Works as Cloak spells.

A1 Night Eye		Night eye On/Off.

A1 Trans.Ingot Iron Steel Dwarven		Transmute Ingot Iron,Steel,Dwarven.
A2 Trans.Ingot Iron Silver Gold			Transmute Ingot Iron,Silver,Gold.
A2 Trans.Ingot Dwarven Corundum Quicksilver	Transmute Ingot Dwarven,Corundum,Quicksilver.
A2 Trans.Ingot Quicksilver Moonstone Malachite	Transmute Ingot Quicksilver,Moonstone,Malachite.
A3 Trans.Ingot Dwarven Orichalcum Ebony		Transmute Ingot Dwarven,Orichalcum,Ebony.

A1 Enchant Weapon Fire		Equipped weapon swings faster, Fire Enchant.
A1 Enchant Weapon Frost		Equipped weapon swings faster, Frost Enchant.
A1 Enchant Weapon Shock		Equipped weapon swings faster, Shock Enchant.
Enchant Weapon : One-handed weapon only

A1 Web			15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Slow.
A1 Enchanter Fire	Create 15-foot radius Enchanter, Equipped weapon swings faster, Fire Enchant.
A1 Enchanter Frost	Create 15-foot radius Enchanter, Equipped weapon swings faster, Frost Enchant.
A1 Enchanter Shock	Create 15-foot radius Enchanter, Equipped weapon swings faster, Shock Enchant.
A3 Hold Monster		15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Paralyze. Stagger effect.

Enchanter : Unenchanted weapon only
1. Cast the spell, and Enchanter(looks like a Wall of Fire/Frost/Shock) appears.
2. Ready your Unenchanted weapon near the Enchanter, and your weapon will be enchanted.


TL_Spell Conjuration List
*version 8 : Create Undead cost lowered

C1 Create Undead 1	192-foot range Instant Hit. Reanimate. Destroyed Undead can be animated again.
C2 Create Undead 2
C3 Create Undead 3
C4 Create Undead 4
C0 Summon Madcrab		24-foot range Summon Madcrab(Level 2, Potent 35).
C1 Summon Fire Drake		24-foot range Summon Fire Drake(Level 6, Potent 36).
C2 Summon Frost Drake		24-foot range Summon Frost Drake(Level 16, Potent 40).
C3 Summon Storm Drake		24-foot range Summon Storm Drake(Level 30, Potent 48).
C4 Summon Dralem		24-foot range Summon Drake Golem, Dralem(Level 35, Potent 50).
C1 Summon Dremora		24-foot range Summon Dremora(Level 6, Potent 36).
C2 Summon Rakshasa		24-foot range Summon Rakshasa(Level 17, Potent 41).
C3 Summon Dwemer Shade		24-foot range Summon Dwemer Shade(Level 30, Potent 48).
C4 Summon Draconian		24-foot range Summon Draconian(Level 40, Potent 60).
C0 Summon Dead Beauty		24-foot range Summon Dead Beauty(Level 3, Dark Souls 24).
C1 Summon Silent Beauty	24-foot range Summon Silent Beauty(Level 6, Dark Souls 30).
C2 Summon Burning Dead		24-foot range Summon Burning Dead(Level 18, Dark Souls 36).
C3 Summon Undead Aldmer	24-foot range Summon Undead Aldmer(Level 30, Dark Souls 45).
C4 Summon Nether Drake		24-foot range Summon Nether Drake(Level 35, Dark Souls 48).

*C1 Hail Storm		Call Hail Storm(10 Physical, 10 Frost damage per 2 seconds). Works as Cloak/Storm Call.
*C2 Call Lightning	Call Lightning(25 Shock damage per 3 seconds). Works as Cloak/Storm Call.
*C3 Meteor Shower	Call Meteor Shower(15-foot radius 15 Physical, 15 Fire damage per 3 seconds). Works as Cloak/Storm Call.
*C4 Apocalypse		Call Apocalypse(15-foot radius 30 Physical, 30 Fire damage per 3 seconds). Works as Cloak/Storm Call.


TL_Spell Destruction List
*version 6 : Impact Push script removed, Generic to Physical(DamageResist)
Base Cost, Magnitude changed

D0 Dwemer Shock		144-foot range Beam. Shock damage. Shock Impact. Disintegrate Finish.
D0 Frost Orb		15-foot radius Explosion. Physical, Frost damage. Physical Impact.
D0 Minute Meteor	2880-foot range Missile. Physical, Fire damage. Physical Impact.
D0 Shadow Frost Orb	15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Physical, Frost damage. Physical Impact.
D1 Absorb Soul		288-foot range Beam. Absorb Health. Frost damage. Magical Impact. Soul Trap.
D1 Fire Blast		96-foot long, 20 degree Cone. Physical, Fire damage. Physical Impact.
D1 Fire Flash		480-foot range Instant Hit. Fire damage. Fire Impact.
D1 Ice Blast		96-foot long, 20 degree Cone. Physical, Frost damage. Physical Impact.
D1 Shockbolt		3/4-foot radius Cylinder. Shock damage. Shock Impact.
D2 Chain Sparks		48-foot range, 15-foot radius Chain. Shock damage. Shock Impact.
D2 Devour Soul		3/2-foot radius Cylinder. Absorb Health. Frost damage. Magical Impact. Soul Trap.
D2 Fire and Ice		480-foot range Missile. Fire, Frost damage. Fire, Frost Impact.
D2 Shadow Fireball	15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Fire damage. Fire Impact.
*D2 Soul Fire		3-foot radius Cylinder. Physical, Fire damage. Physical Impact. Soul Trap.
*D2 Star Blade		60-foot long, 19.6 degree Cone. Physical, Shock damage. Physical Impact.
*D3 Comet		15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Physical, Frost damage. Physical Impact.
D3 Draconic Fire	120-foot long, 20 degree Cone. Fire damage. Disintegrate Finish. Fire Impact.
D3 Draconic Frost	120-foot long, 20 degree Cone. Frost damage. Frost Impact.
*D3 Implosion		15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Physical, Shock damage. Physical Impact. Disintegrate Finish.
*D3 Meteor Swarm	15-foot radius Explosion. Physical, Fire damage. Physical Impact.
*D3 Shadow Meteor Swarm	15-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Physical, Fire damage. Physical Impact.
*D3 Shock Lance		3-foot radius Cylinder. Physical, Shock damage. Physical Impact. Disintegrate Finish.
D4 Burning Soul		3-foot radius Non-Hostile Explosion. Ignore Absorption/Resistance. Generic, Fire damage. Generic Impact Push +15. Soul Trap.
*D4 Death Blizzard	36-foot radius Cylinder. Physical, Frost damage. Physical Impact.
*D4 Elemental Storm	15-foot radius Cylinder. Physical, Fire, Frost, Shock damage. Physical Impact. Disintegrate Finish.
*D4 Moon Ray		480-foot range, 20-foot radius Chain. Absorb Health. Disintegrate Finish. Shock damage. Physical Impact.


TL_Spell Illusion List
*version 6

*I1 Burning Rage	480-foot range Instant Hit. Fire damage. Frenzy.
*I2 Panic		96-foot range, 15-foot radius Invisible Chain. Demoralize. Disarm Sometimes.
*I3 Domination		480-foot range Instant Hit. Dominate.
*I4 Domination Area	96-foot range, 15-foot radius Invisible Chain. Dominate.


TL_Spell Restoration List
*version 6

*R1 Heal Area		15-foot radius Restore Health per second.
*R2 Embalming		15-foot radius Cure Disease, Poison, Resist Disease, Poison, Fortify Heal Rate Mult.
*R3 Dragon Power	15-foot radius Fortify Unarmed Damage, Health, Stamina, Carry Weight, Reduce Time between shouts(buggy).
*R4 Regenerate		15-foot radius Fortify Heal Rate, Combat Health Regenerate Mult.


Experimental
*version 5
*TL_Spell_Resurrect


Safe Destruction spell : All spells except Frost Orb, Meteor Swarm
Non hostile target resist these spells.

Not Safe Destruction spell : Frost Orb, Meteor Swarm
Non hostile target resist these spells, but explosion makes them hostile.

New spells added
Various fix

Merge plugins

New spell tomes are added to vendors and loots
